name: Medusa
description: Medusa is the Gorgon who has venemous snakes for hair. She embodies confidence, independence, resilience, fearless courage, unwaivering faith and the power of rebirth, yet also venom and irreversible fate.

skills.name: Petrifying Gaze
skills.description: Medusa fires a petrifying beam, dealing DMG equal to 320% of ATK to enemies in a rectangle and petrifying them for 3s. Petrified units have their healing effects reduced by 80%.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 340% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: If the target has Serpent Kiss, it deals an additional 10% DMG.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 360% of ATK.

skills.name: Arcane Serpent
skills.description: Medusa shoots a small snake at the nearest enemy without Serpent Kiss, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and inflicting Serpent Kiss. It then bounces to all other enemies with Serpent Kiss (Serpent Kiss reduces the target’s M-RES by 30% for 12s).

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Snake Hair
skills.description: After every 2 attacks, Medusa casts Arcane Serpent.

upgrades.level2: Each Serpent Kiss on the field increases Medusa’s ATK SPD by 10%.
upgrades.level3: She marks the enemy in the opposite position when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Each Serpent Kiss on the field increases Medusa’s ATK SPD by 20%.

skills.name: Serpent Kiss
skills.description: Medusa attacks the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and inflicting Serpent Kiss, reducing the target’s M-RES by 30% for 12s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 250% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 280% of ATK.

relic.name: To the Marrow
relic.description: When Medusa deals DMG to an enemy with Serpent Kiss, she triggers an explosion centered on the target, dealing DMG equal to 80% of her ATK in a small area. This effect has a 5s cooldown for each unit.

upgrades.level3: When an enemy with Serpent Kiss falls, a small snake flies to the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 150% of ATK and inflicting Serpent Kiss.
